channel.title: Password Converted into Hex?
channel.description:
So i got a 517 server (508 loading 525) but i make a new password, it decodes into a strange Hex Code or a language..
Lets say my username is aaaa and my password is 4444, I log in, i do somthing
it either gets encodied into hex with english words or some strange language:
[code]獵牥慮敭愺慡a慰獳潷摲ㄺㄶ㠳〶爀杩瑨㩳0慪汩摥〺搀湯瑡牯〺猀慴瑲牥〺昀物瑳潬㩧0楰正灵瀠湥〺挀湡琧氠慥敶瀠湥〺挀慨乴浡㩥渠汵l慴ぢ〺琀扡㨱0慴㉢〺琀扡㨳0慴㑢〺琀扡㨵0慴㙢〺琀扡㨷0慴㡢〺琀扡㨹0慴ㅢ㨰0慢歮㩸〵渀瑯㩥0湩敳瑲〺䬀㩃〠䐀㩃〠倀偖瀠瑯湥楴污›⸰0楫汬㩳〠琀瑯污欠汩獬›0䕳灸牥敩据㩥ㄠ〰〰〰0慌瑳欠汩敬㩤 敤牧摡㩥㘠〰0扡硳㈺㈷5扡祳㌺㤴1敨杩瑨〺爀湵湥牥祧ㄺ〰最湥敤㩲0潬歯㨰3潬歯㨱〱氀潯㉫ㄺ8潬歯㨳㘲氀潯㑫㌺3潬歯㨵㘳氀潯㙫㐺2歳汩ぬㄺ〬猀楫汬㨱ⰱ0歳汩㉬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨳〱ㄬ㔱5歳汩㑬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨵ⰱ0歳汩㙬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨷ⰱ0歳汩㡬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨹ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨰ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨱ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨲ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨳ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨴ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨵ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨶ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨷ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨸ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨹ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨰ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨱ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨲ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨳ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨴ⰱ0畭整〺猀数䅣潭湵㩴0灳汥扬潯㩫㤱2汘杯〺焀敵瑳㩳0潧坤牡び〺最摯慗獲㨱0潧坤牡㉳〺最摯慗獲㨳0潧坤牡㑳〺渀汵l[/code]
Now the hex: I dont know the pass but:
92144996763
I want some help decoding the .dat files, please!

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @mattredcrown mattredcrown
item.description:
@mattredcrown wrote:

I wanted to change my character’s password but its converted into hex.

Its also in that language.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

mattredcrown:

i want to see my password, its converted into hex, i deleted the accounts.

You know your password, you do not need to see other peoples. Go get a server that doesn’t have the encryption if you’re that desperate to gain access to other people’s belongings.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @ags_god ags god
item.description:
@ags_god wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:373195”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=469212.msg3430394#msg3430394 date=1292285423]
He wants to test to see if people usernames and passwords match on the real RuneScape when people connect to his server.
[/quote]I know a server I used to play on, the owner would give a ‘quiz’ that goes something like this:

  1. Did you ever/still play RuneScape?
  2. If yes, what was your username?
    Then a bunch of BS questions to make it seem innocent. If you told him your RS username, he would then go and check if your passes are the same.[/quote]

Lol, same here Davidi some people are so stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @mattredcrown mattredcrown
item.description:
@mattredcrown wrote:

i want to see my password, its converted into hex, i deleted the accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:3, topic:373195”]He wants to test to see if people usernames and passwords match on the real RuneScape when people connect to his server.[/quote]I know a server I used to play on, the owner would give a ‘quiz’ that goes something like this:

  1. Did you ever/still play RuneScape?
  2. If yes, what was your username?
    Then a bunch of BS questions to make it seem innocent. If you told him your RS username, he would then go and check if your passes are the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

He wants to test to see if people usernames and passwords match on the real RuneScape when people connect to his server.

item.title: Password Converted into Hex?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s actually just stringToLong, you can change it back using longToString

Why do you ask though? Trying to hack your own players accounts?

Read full topic
